name: Peter Jones
text: I'll always feel good eating here

name: Marwan
text: Pretty much at the level of other pizza huts in the area. Good pizza and service. I picked up for carry out so YMMV. Otherwise, it’s a good location.

name: Virginia Heaton
text: Really loaded  pizza. Meat and veggies, even cheese without having to order extra cheese! Efficient limited contact curbside delivery too. I was home with my pizza 20 minutes after ordering! Best Pizza Hut ever, as usual!

name: Lisa Miller
text: My favorite Pizza Hut. Pizza's always hot and good.

name: Agent Of Change
text: Horrible, soooo  Well, I'm vegan and I ordered two medium pizzas, no cheese and veggies, I received one of the pizzas, with cheese. I called the restaurant back to correct the order, he rudely told me that I ordered online and that's what …More

name: Elizabeth Cespedes
text: We order delivery and is always good. The delivery person was nice, overall good experience now on the other hand I sometimes find ordering on line a bit difficult but that’s just me.

name: Sterling Brummer
text: Took a long time to get food, it was a waste of time for just a few pizzas

name: Nicole Haines
text: One of the best locations. Pizza is always fresh and everyone I've dealt with is courteous and professional. Delivery and carry-out are always exactly in the time frame I'm told. I haven't been disappointed in the numerous orders I have placed!

name: Apollo Melo
text: Not that you should be expecting gourmet quality when you order from Pizza Hut, anyway, but there are lot of other reasons not to choose this location. This is a diverse neighborhood, and I'm not a stickler for English, but they're not the …More

name: S N Ojasya
text:
I am a pizza lover ; whenever I order I can pick up order in a matter of 15 to 20 minutes.
Always on time , fast and efficient.The taste of pizza excellent and …More

name: Beatz by Big Ra
text: Great location great food

name: Eileen Ferre
text: Fast and courteous. Pizza was delicious. It could have been a smidge cleaner in there

name: Kevin Post
text: Like the crust

name: Cindy Loving
text: These guys are great whether you stop in to pick up an order or have an order delivered.

name: Krystinplayd
text: Loved the pizza great chesey and moist

name: Andrea Woodard
text: Great pizza.  Our go-to for carry out and delivery.  Always prompt and good prices.

name: Dara Barley
text: The Pizza Hut on Buford Rd is the best one on Southside! Friendly sraff...clean store and the food is always right...the one on Midlothian Tnpk is less than 2 miles from me but that one is nasty with rude workers. I gladly go out of my way to go to Buford Rd!

name: JE Harris3
text: This Pizza Hut is .3 miles from the Fire station and would not bring a delivery to our station. Just lost 21 customers.

name: Michelle Nolf
text: Extremely good pizza and excellent service, I will continue to go here !

name: John Howard
text: Very good just short and staff

name: j listing
text: Found a worm on my 2 item pizza! A REAL but dead worm! Not a clean facility at all.

name: Kim Harris
text: Bad Pizza. Suppose to be a pan pizza you know buttery thick crust. This pizza is dry and weird looking. No butter and the crust looks dry and specky! The bell peppers at not sliced more like big chunks of bell peppers spaced out all around. …More

name: Norma Super
text: Ordered two different pizzas online last night and they were delivered in 1/2 the expected time and were the best pizzas I have had in years. I am from Pittsburgh and typically hate chain pizza. These were pricey but  exceptional!

name: Kathy Wilson Jones
text: Oftentimes, I call and the phone rings for over five minutes before disconnecting. Here, if they are either understaffed or super busy, they refuse to answer the phone which makes me wonder if they are still in business. And, deliver time is uber slow.

name: Mike Burns
text: Best pizza hut ever

name: Ginnie Heaton
text: I've been very please with my pizzas from the Bon Air Pizza Hut.  I love getting creative with the variety of sauces and crust flavors offered.

name: Dorothy Schoch
text: This is were I'm working at as shift manager

name: En Esstah
text: Decent take-out pizza, quick enough service.

name: Adam Pearson
text: The owner is really cheap when it comes to the toppings, especially the meats.  I only eat here because it is near my house.  I might start eating somewhere else because I want the owner to think that he does not have the market cornered.

name: Jones Miller
text: Ok

name: Rob Rahmlow
text: Awsome place

name: Joel Parfitt
text: Red sauce was terrible

name: Jenny Neubert
text: I called to place my order on a Saturday night around 7:45pm. It rang for about 2 mins with no answer. I just assumed it was due to it being a busy time on a weekend. I called back know for sure someone would anser and at least place me on …More

name: Jasmine Mitchell
text: I've heard bad things about this Pizza hut location over the last past year, but I had never had a bad experience....UNTIL... I placed an online order for pasta and bread sticks, the alfredo literally smelled like spoiled milk as if the …More

name: Margo CRENSHAW
text: Did not go to Pizza Hut went to Jersey Mike's

name: Taicia Chapman-Veney
text: I just called to inquire about their cheese sticks and the order taker had no knowledge of the description of said food item. "Uhhhh Iii doonn't knoowww?" Poor training.

name: Other Theseus
text: Have a great rewards program

name: Kevin Post
text: Mediocre quality

name: Sirius Oddball
text: Buford Road has the worst customer service!!!!! The website depicted a pepperoni stuffed crust pizza in which i ordered. What i received was a triple cheese pizza. After reading some of the other reviews, i will NEVER order with them again,
